hook.text: You pick up the goals of the people around you without even noticing. Goals are contagious.

buildup.text: Research by Henk Aarts shows that simply observing someone pursue a goal activates that goal in your brain.

discovery.text: If your friends value fitness, you're more likely to exercise. If they value spending, you'll spend more.

twist.text: This works even with strangers. Watching someone work hard on a task increases your own persistence.

climax.text: Your social environment is a goal-setting system. Choose it as carefully as you choose your goals.

punchline.text: Show me your friends and I'll show you your goals.

quiz.question: What is goal contagion?
options: Unconsciously adopting the goals of people around you
Setting the same goals every year
Goals that spread through social media
